brief_summary: This study was designed to evaluate the safety of the investigational Rotavirus Vaccine and the efficacy to prevent Rotavirus Gastroenteritis.
detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 10 months.
description: Placebo matching RotaTeq™ administered 28 to 70 days apart.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Healthy infants Exclusion Criteria: - History of abdominal disorders from a birth defect, intussusception, or abdominal surgery - Known or suspected problems with immune system - Fever at time of immunization - Prior administration of a rotavirus vaccine - History of known prior rotavirus disease - Chronic diarrhea, or failure to thrive
